group_1.textLeft: *Pant* *Pant*

group_1.textRight: *Wheeze* *Wheeze*

group_1.textLeft: Yippee! We won! We won!

group_1.textRight: Dammit...

group_1.textLeft: Don't you dare mess with us or our movie ever@again.

group_1.textRight: And don't you ever try mugging anyone again,@either!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, speaking of movies, if you guys aren't busy,@would you mind helping us film?

group_1.textRight: Hell no!

group_1.textLeft: Phew... I need a break. I'm bushed.

group_1.textRight: Me too...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we really gave it our all. Feels like we've@been on hard mode for a while now.

group_1.textRight: But our efforts paid off.
With that, we've secured the locale for our movie,
The safety of the lighthouse, and everyone's@cooperation.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
...And I have to admit it was kind of fun.

group_1.textRight: Yes! It was very fulfilling!
Hey, now that that's done, why don't we go@back to the lighthouse?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's right... C'mon, let's go!
So our characters go to the beach to find the@truth about the mermaid legend...
They don't get along at all first,
But they gradually work together to overcome@the obstacles and hazards they face...

group_1.textRight: And they discover that the ghost of the lighthouse@used the legend to cover for his evil deeds!
...In the end, though, there wasn't really a@ghost there.
I guess we'll need that sixth member after all.

group_1.textLeft: And we'll have the ghost be the final boss for@the climax, right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I think we've got it!

group_1.textLeft: That we do.
Now that the broad strokes have been settled, we@can work out the finer details in the filming process.
I suppose we may as well get started on that.

group_1.textRight: I feel like we've hit our stride, so we should get@going as soon as possible!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, how about we start tomorrow?

group_1.textRight: We'd better figure out who our sixth member@will be, then.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, let's try Tomo-C's matching function again.

group_1.textRight: Okay! I've got the app open, and―
...Huh? I have a lot of unread messages...
Oh, same here! I didn't even notice...

group_1.textLeft: ...What the hell is this?!

group_1.textRight: There's a lot of bad things being written about@Ao and Hikaru...
On my and Rena's accounts...?

group_1.textLeft: We didn't do this, I swear!

group_1.textRight: ...Were you hacked?

group_1.textLeft: I think so. There's no way they had time to post@any of this.

group_1.textRight: This is a terrible prank.

group_1.textLeft: ...Do you really believe us?

group_1.textRight: I was just making an educated guess.

group_1.textLeft: ...Right.

group_1.textRight: Thank you...
[chara:120902:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―?!

group_1.textLeft: Sasame's account just posted a photo...?!

group_1.textRight: Hey, I didn't do anything...! My phone did it on@its own!

group_1.textLeft: Maybe someone hacked your account this time!

group_1.textRight: Nnh...!
...This is unforgivable!

group_1.textLeft: Hang on... what's with the photo? It looks like...@a broken aquarium...?

group_1.textRight: Eh...? It looks familiar somehow...
Wait! Isn't that from the beach house?!
